column1: '''Elfstan Fairbairn''' was the son of [[Fastred of Greenholm]] and [[Samwise Gamgee]]'s eldest daughter [[Elanor Gardner
column4: Later}}</ref> Obviously he was also a [[Warden of Westmarch]].<ref name=guide/>

column1: His name means "Elfstone", and probably he was named so in honor of King [[Elessar]].<ref name=guide>{{HM
